instruction: Compose a song with the following lyrical concepts.
output:
Verse 1:
Encountering the raging sea
The wave of life beats against me
It’ll take more than I thought to keep me together
I have to be resilient, so I don’t surrender

Chorus:
Oh, I'm on the journey of discovery
Riding the wave with resilience
A tale of courage beyond what I knew
I must keep going on this journey to discover me

Verse 2:
Voices in the wind singing a song
Of tales of courage, a new dawn
No matter how far I travel or how high I go
The songs of courage keep empowering me so

Chorus:
Oh, I'm on the journey of discovery
Riding the wave with resilience
A tale of courage beyond what I knew
I must keep going on this journey to discover me

Bridge:
And though the sea's a choppy shore
I can still reach the distant shore
My courage holds true, my spirit runs free
Resiliance will guide me relentlessly

Chorus:
Oh, I'm on the journey of discovery
Riding the wave with resilience
A tale of courage beyond what I knew
I must keep going on this journey to discover me.
